value.0:
On armors, my master recommends specific spells, always with adequate funds and life energy available.

Blindness and Deafness - To Resist Sonic Attacks
Bull's Strength - To Become Stonger
Call Lightning - To Resist Electrical Attacks
Cat's Grace - To Become More Silent
Chain Lightning - To Resist Stronger Electrical Attacks
Cone of Cold - To Resist Stronger Cold Attacks
Firebrand - To Resist Stronger Fire Attacks
Flame Weapon - To Resist Fire Attacks
Gust of Wind - To Resist Greater Sonic Attacks
Ice Storm - To Resist Cold Attacks
Control Undead - To Resist
Firebrand - To Resist Stronger Fire Attacks
Flame Weapon - To Resist Fire Attacks
Gust of Wind - To Resist Stronger Sonic Attackcs
Ice Storm - To Resist Cold Attacks
Invisibility - To Become Better Hidden
Lightning Bolt - To Resist Electrical Attacks
Mage Armor - To Improve Armor
Magic Vestment - To Improve Armor
Melf's Acid Arrow - To Resist Acid Attacks
Mestil's Acid Breath - To Resist Stronger Acid Attacks
